SELECT t.*, COALESCE(s.today_pv, 0) AS todayPv, # LEFT JOIN 连不上的时候，s.today_pv 是 null，前端不希望看到null，所以修改为0 COALESCE(s.today_uv, 0) AS todayUv, # COALESCE(a, b) 的意思是：如果 a 是 null，就用 b COALESCE(s.today_uip, 0) AS todayUip FROM t_link t LEFT JOIN t_link_stats_today s # 左表为主合并两个表，右表根据on字段匹配左表，匹配不上的字段为null ON t.gid = s.gid AND t.full_short_url = s.full_short_url AND s.date = CURDATE() # 只把“右表中属于今天的统计数据”拿来做关联 WHERE t.gid = #{gid} # 筛选左表的条件, select * AND t.enable_status = 0 AND t.del_flag = 0 # 根据parameterType参数的orderTag排序
ORDER BY todayPv DESC
ORDER BY todayUv DESC
ORDER BY todayUip DESC
ORDER BY t.total_pv DESC
ORDER BY t.total_uv DESC
ORDER BY t.total_uip DESC
ORDER BY t.create_time DESC # 默认使用create_time排序
